com.security

Class Caesar

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.security.Caesar

  • public class Caesar
extends java.lang.Object
    The Caesar class is the responsible of the functionality behind the Caesar cipher program. Here it contains the methods to cipher, or decipher, depending on which mode is selected.
    Author:
    Eng. Eduardo Basurto

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.String alphabet
      Alphabet to be used by the cipher/decipher process.
      private int k
      Key to be input by the user.
      private java.lang.String message
      Message to be input by the user.
      private java.lang.String restrictedAlphabet
      Alphabet to be used by the cipher/decipher process when the restricted mode is selected.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Caesar()
      Default constructor of the Caesar class.
      Caesar(int ka, java.lang.String text)
      onstructor to establish the key and the message for the Caesar object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String cipher()
      Method used by the class to cipher the message using the whole alphabet.
      java.lang.String decipher()
      Method used by the class to decipher the message using the whole alphabet.
      java.lang.String getAlphabet()
      Get method for the alphabet field.
      java.lang.String getRestrictedAlphabet()
      Get method for the restrictedAlphabet field.
      java.lang.String restrictedCipher()
      Method used by the class to cipher the message using only alfanumeric characters.
      java.lang.String restrictedDecipher()
      Method used by the class to decipher the message using only alfanumeric characters.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • k

        private int k
        Key to be input by the user. Default value is zero.

      • message

        private java.lang.String message
        Message to be input by the user. Default value is null

      • alphabet

        private final java.lang.String alphabet
        Alphabet to be used by the cipher/decipher process. The list of every character used by this field can be found in the Constant Field Values
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • restrictedAlphabet

        private final java.lang.String restrictedAlphabet
        Alphabet to be used by the cipher/decipher process when the restricted mode is selected. The list of every character used by this field can be found in the Constante Field Values
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • Caesar

        public Caesar()
        Default constructor of the Caesar class. This is used only for reference in the CaesarFrame class.

        The behaviour of this object is:

        • value for k is zero
        • value for message is null
        • alphabet and restrictedAlphabet fields are final

      • Caesar

        public Caesar(int ka,
              java.lang.String text)
        onstructor to establish the key and the message for the Caesar object. This is used mainly to initiate a cipher/decipher process
        Parameters:
        ka - The key for the Caesar object
        text - The text to be ciphered/deciphered

    • Method Detail

      • getAlphabet

        public java.lang.String getAlphabet()
        Get method for the alphabet field. This is used to verify if a character is in the alphabet or to know the length of the alphabet to select a key range.
        Returns:
        the String containing the alphabet
        See Also:
        String

      • getRestrictedAlphabet

        public java.lang.String getRestrictedAlphabet()
        Get method for the restrictedAlphabet field. This is used to verify if a character is in the restrictedAlphabet or to know the length of the alphabet to select a key range.
        Returns:
        the String containing the restricedAlphabet
        See Also:
        String

      • cipher

        public java.lang.String cipher()
        Method used by the class to cipher the message using the whole alphabet. It is used after only after establishing the values for k and message.
        Returns:
        The String containing the message ciphered
        See Also:
        String

      • restrictedCipher

        public java.lang.String restrictedCipher()
        Method used by the class to cipher the message using only alfanumeric characters. It is used only after establishing the values for k and message.
        Returns:
        The alfanumeric String containing the message ciphered
        See Also:
        String

      • decipher

        public java.lang.String decipher()
        Method used by the class to decipher the message using the whole alphabet. It is used only after establishing the values for k and message.
        Returns:
        The String containing the message deciphered
        See Also:
        String

      • restrictedDecipher

        public java.lang.String restrictedDecipher()
        Method used by the class to decipher the message using only alfanumeric characters. It is used only after establishing the values for k and message.
        Returns:
        The alphanumeric String containing the message deciphered
        See Also:
        String
